title: Geraldine Atayan - Web Developer
description: Web portfolio created by Geraldine Atayan using Gatsby.js
about: I'm a front end developer focused on using JavaScript (ES6 practices). I graduated in 2017 with a Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems from De La Salle University-Manila. I am adaptable, and love to continuously improve myself, not only in developing applications or knowledge on paper, but as well as my personal growth. I am fluent in English, Filipino, and can read and speak elementary level Mandarin.

workExperience.company: Orange and Bronze Software Labs Inc.
